summary: This mod will add several unique characters with different fighting styles abilities and unique personalities who will become your companion.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will contain unique characters with unique fighting styles and personalities.
John the city guard with a tragic war story. He wields a sword and shield.

Cole, a Nomadic Nord barbarian who roams eastern Skyrim. He wields a longsword and fights with barbaric ferocity.


Bo, a farmer who dreams of adventure. Isnt trained in any fighting style but has a lotta heart.

Zandrew, a surviving Blade he is skilled in sneak and one handed swordsmen ship.

Arron, a Dark Elf who resides in Dragons Reach he is skilled with the bow and knife and is a sneaky fellow.
author: LegateRodriguez
